This is the Mythbuntu team's portion of the Ubuntu Wiki.

=== Project Definition ===
This is a project based on creating a Ubuntu based complete distro that installs a minimal Ubuntu installation and MythTV and associated software.  MythTV is a full-blown Home Theatre PC.  Further information can be found at the official MythTV website http://www.mythtv.com and the Mythbuntu website at http://www.mythbuntu.org
